Title: The Shining
Synopsis: A family heads to an isolated hotel where a sinister presence influences the father.

Title: Inception
Synopsis: A thief steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology.

Title: The Matrix
Synopsis: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion.

Title: Interstellar
Synopsis: Explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

Title: Parasite
Synopsis: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family.
